Direct link to the M0ODZ BATC page
https://batc.org.uk/live/M0ODZ

üì¨ NEW FEATURE: ODZ-MAIL IS LIVE! Ever wanted to leave a message for a fellow op? Now you can! ODZBot now supports a persistent mail system for callsigns. How it works: Send Mail: !sendmail [Callsign] [Message] Alerts: Users are notified the moment they join the chat. Retrieve: !getmail (Messages delete after reading) Quick Start: !sendmail G7XYZ Hi there, catch you on the next net! !getmail ‚Äî Check your own inbox. --- COMMANDS --- !help [cmd] ‚Äî Show detailed help for a specific command. !menu ‚Äî üìã View the full Canteen and Station interaction menu. !list / !request [term] ‚Äî Show random videos or search for a keyword. !play [n] ‚Äî Play video #n (e.g., !play 42). !message [text] ‚Äî Leave a message for the station operator. !dice / !coinflip ‚Äî Let the bot decide your fate. !socials / !url ‚Äî Links to the Web Controller, GitHub, and QRZ. !ping / !uptime / !status ‚Äî View system health and latency. !sysop ‚Äî Alert the station operator for assistance. --- INTERACTION --- Canteen üçî : !coffee, !tea, !juice, !cookie, !biscuit, !pizza, !burger, !chips, !cake Station üìª : !shackcat, !antenna, !valve, !component, !signal, !diagnose, !fix Social & Fun: !hug, !joke, !bofh, !fortune, !eightball, !fact, !ham, !weather, !confess, !upgrade Visit my jukebox to choose a new video to play at: https://jukebox.gregoryfenton.com

Direct link to the Jukebox page
https://jukebox.gregoryfenton.com
üé∂ The server is waiting for your instructions at https://jukebox.gregoryfenton.com.

CQ Amateur Radio Hall of Fame Seeks Nominations: The CQ Amateur Radio Hall of Fame is seeking nominations for the 2026 class of inductees. 3 nomination will be inducted in 2026.The CQ Amateur Radio Hall of Fame was established in January, 2001, to recognize those individuals, whether licensed radio amateurs or not, who significantly affected the course of amateur radio; and radio amateurs who, in the course of their professional lives, had a significant impact on their professions or on world affairs.Nominations may be sent to Tom Roscoe (K8CX) at k8cx@hamgallery.com. See nomination guidelines. Source: hamgallery.com
